channel.title: NPC Help, i tried many times to fix
channel.description:
Ok, i know how to make custom items, but today, i figured out that you can also make NPC's, GFX's, and Objects. I tried to make a npc, i did in metesque thing, then made a dat, then g zipped it, added he ints, but when i spawn him, hes invisable, Heres my ints, and pics, and steps i did. (Im useing Ddsspeced Source)
[b]Heres my NPC[/b] [URL=http://www.picoodle.com/view.php?img=/3/2/3/f_Metm_e277efb.png&srv=img18][IMG]http://img18.picoodle.com/img/img18/3/2/3/f_Metm_e277efb.png[/img][/URL]
[b]I put the model into dat maker, and made a dat file[/b] [URL=http://www.picoodle.com/view.php?img=/3/2/3/f_datm_756c37e.png&srv=img19][IMG]http://img19.picoodle.com/img/img19/3/2/3/f_datm_756c37e.png[/img][/URL]
[b]Then i g zipped the dat file, and named it 13999[/b] [URL=http://www.picoodle.com/view.php?img=/3/2/3/f_Npcm_4f98904.png&srv=img19][IMG]http://img19.picoodle.com/img/img19/3/2/3/f_Npcm_4f98904.png[/img][/URL]
[b]Heres my int[/b] [code] if(i == 1117) { // NPC ID aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630]; class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60); // Don't need to worry class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5]; class5.aStringArray66[1] = "Attack"; // class5.anIntArray94 = new int[1]; // Number of models the NPC uses, the class5.anIntArray94[0] = 13999; // MODEL ID class5.aString65 = "Montax Warrior"; // NPC name class5.anInt61 = 650; // Combat level class5.aByteArray89 = "The ancient Montax god.".getBytes(); // NPC description[/code]
Does anyone know what i did wrong?

item.title: NPC Help, i tried many times to fix
item.dc:creator: @Arcainex Arcainex
item.description:
@Arcainex wrote:

this happened to me…

when you log in your server whteva the model number is say

“add model ######”

then restart your server and client and it shud be added

Read full topic
item.source: NPC Help, i tried many times to fix

item.title: NPC Help, i tried many times to fix
item.dc:creator: @Gamerstips Gamerstips
item.description:
@Gamerstips wrote:

Ok, i know how to make custom items, but today, i figured out that you can also make NPC’s, GFX’s, and Objects. I tried to make a npc, i did in metesque thing, then made a dat, then g zipped it, added he ints, but when i spawn him, hes invisable, Heres my ints, and pics, and steps i did. (Im useing Ddsspeced Source)

Heres my NPC

I put the model into dat maker, and made a dat file

Then i g zipped the dat file, and named it 13999

Heres my int

if(i == 1117) { // NPC ID aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630]; class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60); // Don't need to worry class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5]; class5.aStringArray66[1] = "Attack"; // class5.anIntArray94 = new int[1]; // Number of models the NPC uses, the class5.anIntArray94[0] = 13999; // MODEL ID class5.aString65 = "Montax Warrior"; // NPC name class5.anInt61 = 650; // Combat level class5.aByteArray89 = "The ancient Montax god.".getBytes(); // NPC description

Does anyone know what i did wrong?

Read full topic
